decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number(s): Site Location Plan, Site Block Plan, Existing Floor Plans and Elevations No. LON2/E1, Proposed Floor Plans No. LON2/P1 received 27.04.2023, Proposed Elevations No. LON2/P2 received 27.04.2023, Proposed Site Location Plan.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4, 7A and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013). | No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy D6 of the London Plan (2021). | The side first floor window, shall be obscure glazed and non-openable below 1.70m from floor level, unless otherwise confirmed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
Reason: To safeguard neighbouring amenity from overlooking in accordance with policy 7A of Ealing's Development Management DPD (2013) and policy D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Single storey side/rear wraparound extension; first floor rear extension; alterations of fenestration to the rear elevation including the incorporation of a Juliet balcony to the second floor rear elevation
